teamBuff.name: Outro Skill: Strike Before Ready
teamBuff.desc: Grant 50% Echo Skill DMG Amplification to the incoming Resonator, lasting for 14s or until the Resonator is switched out.

teamBuff.name: Sundering Strike
teamBuff.desc: For every 1% of Qiuyuan's Crit. Rate over 50%, this skill increases the Crit. DMG of all nearby active Resonators in the team by 2% for 30s, up to 30%.

teamBuff.name: Bamboo's Shade
teamBuff.desc: When Qiuyuan reaches 400 points of Swordster's Soliloquy, he gains the {Bamboo's Shade} effect, granting all nearby active Resonators in the team 30% Echo Skill DMG Bonus for 30s.

teamBuff.name: Sequence Node 2: O Blade, I, Who Teach No More
teamBuff.desc: {Bamboo's Shade} now grants an additional 30% Echo Skill DMG Amplification to all nearby active Resonators in the team.
